item.title: Review: The Complete Guide to Blender Graphics, Second Edition: Computer Modeling and Animation (2014)
item.description: The following is a review of The Complete Guide to Blender Graphics, Second Edition: Computer Modeling and Animation, published in 2014, and written by John M. Blain.
